titleStmt.title: An epistle discoursing vpon the present pestilence Teaching what it is, and how the people of God should carrie themselues towards God and their neighbour therein. Reprinted with some additions. By Henoch Clapham.
titleStmt.author: Clapham, Henoch.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. C[reede] for the Widow Newberry, and are to be sold at her shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Ball,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: An epistle touching the pestilence.
Cf. Folger Shakespeare Library Catalogue, which gives signatures: A-B⁴.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: her shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Ball
